text.section:
This section does not apply to any controlled hazardous substance that is:
Used for residential purposes; or
Regulated by the State Department of Agriculture.

Any person who generates, uses, treats, stores, or disposes of a controlled hazardous substance at any time after 6 months from the date the Department issues a rule or regulation that identifies the hazardous substance to be a controlled hazardous substance shall file a report with the Department.

The report required by this section:
Shall be filed within a time set by the Department;
Shall be on the form provided by the Department; and
Shall include the following information about the controlled hazardous substance, if applicable:
Name of the hazardous substance.
Volume.
Quantity.
Level and kind of radioactivity.
Half-life.
Manner of management.
Manner of disposal.
